structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

text.section: To integrate a violence prevention focus within the department of public health and those agencies which receive funding from the department;

To develop collaborative relationships with other state agencies which are interested or active in the reduction of interpersonal violence including child abuse, youth violence, domestic violence, sexual assault and elderly abuse;
To integrate violence prevention education into substance use and abuse prevention programs;
To support the development of comprehensive community-based violence prevention initiatives within cities and towns across the state; and
To develop sources of funding to maintain the office and expand its activities.
